GSD.description:
NFSD: prevent integer overflow on 32 bit systems

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.2 by commit e4195d27306ea468a6dc3a27af6f586709951229. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: NFSD: prevent integer overflow on 32 bit systems
